title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Lakers pursuit of another championship with LeBron James and why they need Anthony Davis to play to his full potential. He takes a look at Damian Lillard's deteriorating relationship with the Trail Blazers and why he should force a trade to the Boston Celtics. After the Seahawks announce Jamal Adams will miss the remainder of the season, Colin explains why this was a bad trade to begin with. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to defend the Kansas City Chiefs as the best team in the NFL right now. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
